sections.heading: on motions, continuances, and amendments
sections.text: Unless otherwise provided by statute, the costs of motions, continuances, amendments, and the like, shall be taxed and paid as the court in its discretion may direct.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 619, p. 504;R.S.1913, ยง 8166;C.S.1922, ยง 9117;C.S.1929, ยง 20-1707;R.S.
